author: tvolkert
msg: Added v0.9 HTTP client tools app.  It depended on SwingAdapter & JTextArea, which no longer are supported, so v1 will wait until TextArea is completed.

author: tvolkert
msg: Added support for a developer-specified HostnameVerifier on HTTPS queries, and tied the content-type header of the query's http request to the MIME type of the query's serializer.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add initial implementation of TagDecorator (incomplete - requires decorator API update); fix bug in Component#repaint() (immediate flag was being ignored); fixes and updates to text API.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Fix bug in repainting TextArea caret; temporarily hide caret (until editing is actually implemented).
